description: A flaw has been found in kidaze CourseSelectionSystem up to 42cd892b40a18d50bd4ed1905fa89f939173a464. This issue affects some unknown processing of the file /Profilers/PriProfile/COUNT3s6.php. Executing manipulation of the argument CPU can lead to sql injection. The attack may be performed from remote. The exploit has been published and may be used. This product utilizes a rolling release system for continuous delivery, and as such, version information for affected or updated releases is not disclosed.
